name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xiami- Shopee Affiliate Partner Invitation Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for Shopee affiliate marketing to boost sales by  inviting  influencers to promote products  with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Functional introduction:
1. Automatically send batch private messages to influencers and product cards, reaching tens of thousands of influencers every day.
2. You can set up scheduled private message tasks, and the system will automatically execute private messages at the preset time point. Merchants can ensure that the information is received during the active time period in the influencer's time zone.
3. Send batch private messages to order buyers to improve store ratings. Sellers' real feedback: order cancellation rate decreased by 40%, praise rate increased by 30%, new product exposure increased by 300%, and store repurchase increased by 30%.
4. You can choose whether to skip the influencers you have contacted to avoid repeated contact with the same influencer
5. You can customize the influencer blacklist, which will automatically skip the influencers on the blacklist to avoid cooperation with bad alliance partners.
6. You can specify influencers to send, support importing influencer excel tables or entering influencer IDs to send private message content to specified influencers.
7. Support cross-border stores and local stores, covering Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, the Philippines, Brazil and other markets, opening up broader business opportunities for you

Core highlights:
● Automated operation: Realize the automation of online private message invitations, and establish 10,000 connections in 2 hours in a single store scenario, with an efficiency increase of 500%.
● Convenient operation: It does not occupy the clipboard and mouse, allowing you to focus on work invitations without being distracted by the details of the operation.
● All-weather service: Provide 7x24 hours of uninterrupted invitation services, make full use of time advantages, and create value every moment.
● Cross-platform compatibility: Adapt to the fingerprint browser of the entire network to ensure wide compatibility and stable operation experience.
● Global support: Support cross-border and local stores together, giving you a competitive advantage in different markets.
